org.neuroph.eval

Class CrossValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neuroph.eval.CrossValidation

  • public class CrossValidation
extends Object
    This class implements multithreaded cross validation procedure. Splits data set into k subsets (folds), trains the network with data from k-1 and tests with one subset Repeats the procedure k times each time using different subset for testing.
    Author:
    Boris Fulurija, Lukic Sasa Multithreading, Zoran Sevarac
